source_sentence: 世界之中無有晝夜，以華開合而知時節。
translation: There's no day or night in the world, and they know the seasons by opening and closing their flowers.

source_sentence: 諸菩薩等在金華中自然出生，既得生已，皆得悉見種種莊嚴三昧，以三昧力故，
translation: The enlightening beings are born spontaneously in the golden flower. Having been born, they can see all kinds of adornments and concentrations because of the power of these concentrations:

source_sentence: 得見十方如微塵等諸世界中現在諸佛。
translation: They can see the buddhas present in the worlds in the ten directions like tiny particles of dust and so forth.

source_sentence: 於此三昧，一念之頃具足六通：以天耳故，悉聞十方如微塵等世界現在諸佛說法音聲；
translation: In this concentration the enlightening beings are endowed with six supernormal knowledges in a single instant of thought:

source_sentence: 以宿命智，知過去世如一佛土微塵等劫宿世之事；
translation: By knowledge of past lives they know the events of past ages as numerous as atoms in one buddha-land.

source_sentence: 以天眼故，悉見十方諸佛世界種種莊嚴；
translation: With celestial vision they saw all the various adornments of the buddha-lands of the ten directions.

source_sentence: 以他心智故，於一念中，得知如一佛世界微塵數等世界眾生心之所念，
translation: Because of knowledge of the minds of others, in a single thought they can know the thoughts of sentient beings in as many worlds as atoms in one buddha-field.

source_sentence: 乃至成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，終不失是三昧。
translation: He'll never lose this concentration until he achieves unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 清旦之時，四方有風柔軟清淨，吹微妙香及散諸華，以風力故，諸菩薩等從三昧起，
translation: At dawn in the morning, a gentle and clear breeze blows from all directions, scattering exquisite fragrances and scattering flowers. Because of the power of this wind, enlightening beings emerge from concentration:

source_sentence: 三昧起已，即得如是如意通力。
translation: After the samādhi arises, he attains the supernormal power of thusness.

source_sentence: 以是力故，於一念頃能到十方，一一方面如一佛土微塵數等諸佛世界，
translation: Because of this power, in a moment of thought they can reach all ten directions, as many buddha-worlds as atoms in one land on each side of the polar mountain.

source_sentence: 供養現在諸佛世尊，請受妙法，即一念中，還至本土無有罣閡。
translation: In a single thought, they return to their native land without any obstruction when they make offerings to the present buddhas and world-honored ones who ask them to receive the wonderful teaching.

source_sentence: 諸菩薩等在曼陀羅華、摩訶曼陀羅華華臺之中，結加趺坐思惟法門，所謂欲得見我所在方面，
translation: The bodhisattvas were sitting cross-legged on the lotus flower dais of maṇḍala flowers and mahāmandārava flowers, contemplating the teachings. They said, “If you wish to see where I am,

source_sentence: 隨身所向，悉令得見；
translation: Whatever they were pointing out in their bodies, they caused to be seen.

source_sentence: 若於深法有疑滯者，以見我故，尋得除滅；
translation: Those who have doubts about the profound doctrine can, because of seeing self, be freed from those doubts.

source_sentence: 若有問義，欲聽法者，以見我故，即得深解無有狐疑。
translation: If someone asks about the meaning of the teaching and wants to hear it, because they see me, they'll attain profound understanding without doubt.

source_sentence: 所有菩薩深解無我及無我所，是故能捨身根、命根，一切必定不退於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: All the bodhisattvas who deeply understand selflessness and what belongs to selflessness are therefore able to abandon the body faculty and life faculty, and all of them will surely not regress from unsurpassed, correct, or complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 世界無有一切不善之名，亦無受戒、破戒之名、毀戒、悔過。
translation: In the world, there's no name for all unwholesome things, and there's no name for accepting precepts, violating precepts, disparaging precepts, or repenting.

source_sentence: 一切眾生，其身皆有三十二相，得那羅延力，乃至成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，
translation: All sentient beings had thirty-two distinctive marks in their bodies and attained the power of enlightenment, until they achieved unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 無有一人六根毀缺不完具者。
translation: There's no one person who disparages the six faculties and doesn't complete them.

source_sentence: 所有眾生即於生已，鬚髮自落，服三法衣，得善分別三昧，乃至阿耨多羅三藐三菩提終不中失。
translation: All the sentient beings who are born will then have their hair shaved, don the three Dharma robes, and attain well-discriminating concentration, even up to unsurpassed, correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 諸眾生等，悉得和合一切善根，無有一人為老病所苦。
translation: All sentient beings and so forth can combine all good roots, and there's not a single person who suffers from old age and illness.

source_sentence: 若諸菩薩命終之時，結加趺坐，入於火定，自燒其身，燒其身已，四方清風來吹其身，
translation: “When the bodhisattvas die, they sit cross-legged and enter the concentration of fire. Having burned their own bodies, a gentle breeze blows in all directions to ravage them.

source_sentence: 舍利散在諸方無佛世界，尋時變作摩尼寶珠，如轉輪聖王所有寶珠。
translation: When the relics were scattered in all directions, there were no buddha worlds, and when they did so, they became maṇi jewels, just like the precious pearls that the wheel-turning sage king had.

source_sentence: 若有眾生見觸之者，悉令不墮三惡道中，乃至涅槃不受諸苦，即得捨身生於他方現在佛所，
translation: If there are any sentient beings who see and touch them, they’ll all be prevented from falling into the three bad destinies... [and] attain nirvana without suffering. They’ll be able to relinquish their bodies and be born elsewhere in the presence of the Buddha.

source_sentence: 諮受妙法，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心便不退轉。
translation: When he consults and receives the wonderful teaching, he gives rise to the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment and doesn't retreat.

source_sentence: 所有眾生若命終時，其心在定無有散亂，不受諸苦愛別離等。
translation: When all sentient beings die, their minds are in meditation without distraction, and they don't experience suffering, craving, separation, and so forth.

source_sentence: 命終之後，不墮八難無佛之世，乃至成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，常得見佛，
translation: At the end of his life, he won’t fall into the eight difficulties of a buddhaless world, until he attains unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment and always sees Buddha.

source_sentence: 諮受妙法，供養眾僧。
translation: He inquired into the marvelous Dharma and offered support to the saṃgha.

source_sentence: 一切眾生離於貪欲、瞋恚、愚癡、恩愛、嫉妬、無明、憍慢。
translation: All sentient beings are free of desire, anger, folly, love, jealousy, ignorance, and arrogance.

source_sentence: 世界無有聲聞、緣覺，所有大眾純諸菩薩摩訶薩等充滿其國，其心柔軟，
translation: There were no śrāvakas or pratyekbuddhas in the world. All the great assemblies of bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and so forth filled the land; their minds were soft and gentle,

source_sentence: 無有愛濁，堅固不退於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提得諸三昧。
translation: Without craving and turbidity, he's resolute and doesn't regress from unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment to attain the samādhis.

source_sentence: 世界純有清淨光明，十方如微塵等諸佛世界，悉皆得聞我之世界。
translation: The world has pure light, and all the buddha-realms in the ten directions like dust motes can hear my world.

source_sentence: 我界所有微妙之香，悉遍十方如微塵等諸佛世界，我界眾生常得快樂，
translation: The subtle fragrance of my realm pervades the ten directions, like atoms in all buddha-lands. All sentient beings in my realm always attain bliss.

source_sentence: 未曾聞有受苦之聲。
translation: I've never heard the sound of suffering before.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我行菩薩道時不作齊限，我今要當莊嚴如是清淨佛土，眾生之類皆使清淨遍滿其國，
translation: I will now adorn such a pure buddha-land so that all living beings can be purified and pervade it.

source_sentence: 然後乃成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: Then he'll attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，當出無量無邊光明照於十方，如千佛剎微塵數等諸佛世界，
translation: I will attain unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment, emanating boundless rays of light illuminating the ten directions equal to the number of buddha-fields in a thousand buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 令彼眾生悉遙見我三十二相，即時得斷貪欲、瞋恚、愚癡、嫉妬、無明、憍慢一切煩惱，
translation: Causing all those sentient beings to see the thirty-two marks of self from afar, they will at once be freed from all afflictions of desire, anger, folly, jealousy, ignorance, and arrogance.

source_sentence: 發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，如其所求得陀羅尼三昧忍辱。
translation: They give rise to the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment and attain the forbearance of dhāraṇī samādhi as they seek it.

source_sentence: 以見我故，寒冰地獄所有眾生悉得熅樂，譬如菩薩入第二禪。
translation: Because they see me, all the sentient beings in cold and ice hell attain bliss, like a bodhisattva entering the second dhyāna.

source_sentence: 以見我故，身心受於第一妙樂，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，若其命終，
translation: Because of their views of self, they experience the first subtle bliss in body and mind, and give rise to the thought of unexcelled, complete perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 要當生我佛之世界，生已即得不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提；
translation: You will be born in the world of my buddha, and after you have been born there, you will attain unregressing perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 熱地獄等、畜生、餓鬼亦復如是。
translation: So it is with hot hells and so forth, animals and hungry ghosts.

source_sentence: 諸天所見光明一倍。
translation: The light seen by the gods is one times as great.

source_sentence: 令我壽命無量無邊無能數者，除一切智。
translation: He who causes my life span to be immeasurable, limitless, and incalculable except for omniscience.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，令十方無量無邊阿僧祇世界現在諸佛稱讚於我，
translation: Having attained unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment, I cause the buddhas of the ten directions to praise me in measureless, limitless, and incalculable worlds.

source_sentence: 其餘眾生若得聞是稱讚我聲，願作善根速生我國，命終之後必生我國，
translation: If the other sentient beings hear my voice and praise it, may their good roots quickly be born in our land! They will surely be born in our land when their lives end.

source_sentence: 唯除五逆、毀壞正法、誹謗聖人。
translation: They only remove the five heinous crimes, disparage the right teaching, and denigrate sages.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，十方無量無邊阿僧祇世界中所有眾生，若聞我聲，
translation: “Once I have attained unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment, if any sentient beings in the infinite, boundless, and incalculable worlds of the ten directions hear my voice

source_sentence: 發願欲生我世界者，是諸眾生臨命終時，悉令見我與諸大眾前後圍遶，
translation: Those who make the vow to be born in my world are those sentient beings who, at the time of their death, cause me to appear before and after the great assembly.

source_sentence: 我於爾時入無翳三昧，以三昧力故，現在其前而為說法，以聞法故，尋得斷除一切苦惱，
translation: At that time I entered the state of non-strife concentration. Because of the power of this concentration, I appeared before him and preached the Dharma. By listening to the Dharma I was able to eliminate all kinds of pain and suffering.

source_sentence: 心大歡喜，其心喜故，得寶冥三昧，以三昧力故，令心得念及無生忍，
translation: Their minds were greatly joyful, and because of their hearts’ joy they attained the concentration called ‘jeweled absorption.’ Because of the power of this concentration, they caused their minds to be endowed with mindfulness and tolerance of nonorigination.

source_sentence: 命終之後必生我界。
translation: After death, he'll surely be born in the self realm.

source_sentence: 若餘世界諸眾生等無有七財，不欲修集行於三乘，不欲生於人天中者，
translation: If there are sentient beings in other worlds who don't have the seven treasures and don't want to cultivate accumulation and practice the three vehicles, and don't want to be born among humans or gods,

source_sentence: 亦不修行一切善根及三福處，非法行污、愛著惡欲、專行邪見，如是眾生，
translation: Nor do they cultivate all roots of goodness and the three bases of virtue, indulge in unlawful behavior, cling to bad desires, or exclusively practice wrong views. Such sentient beings

source_sentence: 願我入於無燋惱三昧，以三昧力故，彼諸眾生若命終時，我與大眾而住其前為說妙法，
translation: “May I enter peaceful concentration and, by the power of this concentration, may all sentient beings at the time of their death be able to expound the Teaching.

source_sentence: 復為示現佛土所有，又勸令發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，眾生聞已，即於我所，
translation: “Furthermore, in order to show what belongs to the Buddha-lands, I also urge living beings to develop the aspiration for unexcelled, complete perfect enlightenment. Having heard these words, sentient beings come to me.

source_sentence: 心生深信，歡喜安樂，尋發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，令彼眾生得斷苦惱，
translation: Their minds become deeply convinced, joyful and at ease. They develop the determination for unexcelled, complete perfect enlightenment and cause those sentient beings to be liberated from suffering and distress.

source_sentence: 斷苦惱已，便得日燈光明三昧，斷於癡闇，命終之後，尋生我界。』
translation: After he stops suffering and distress, he then attains the concentration of the sunlight samādhi and stops the darkness of delusion, and after his life ends, he'll be born in my realm.'

source_sentence: 「爾時，寶藏如來讚言：『善哉！
translation: At the time, the Ratnaketu Tathāgata praised him, saying, 'Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Excellent, good!

source_sentence: 汝今乃能作微妙之大願也。』
translation: Now, you're able to make a subtle and great vow.'

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若我所願成就得己利者，願令十方如微塵等諸佛世界，悉雨憂陀羅婆羅香、并栴檀香、牛頭栴檀香、種種末香。
translation: If what I wish to accomplish for my own benefit, may all the buddha worlds in the ten directions like dusty grains of dust rain uḍumbara fragrance, sandalwood fragrance, oxhead sandalwood fragrance, and various powdered fragrances.

source_sentence: 若有眾生在在處處聞是香者，悉發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: If there are sentient beings everywhere who hear this fragrance, they'll all give rise to the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 令我今者得金剛願三昧，以三昧力故，悉得遙見諸世界中所雨諸香。』
translation: That will cause me to now attain the adamantine vow samādhi, and because of the power of that samādhi, I'll be able to see the fragrances that rain down in all the worlds from afar.'

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 爾時王子說是言已，尋得三昧，自見十方如微塵數等諸佛世界，所有諸香憂陀羅婆羅香、牛頭栴檀、種種末香，
translation: After he had uttered these words, the prince found his concentration and saw for himself all the fragrances of the buddha-lands in the ten directions, as numerous as atoms in the ten directions:

source_sentence: 及見一一方面有不可計諸眾生等，恭敬叉手，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: And seeing that there are countless sentient beings in one direction, they saluted them with their palms together and aroused the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 寶藏如來告王子言：『善男子！
translation: The Ratnaketu Tathāgata told the prince, 'Good man!

source_sentence: 汝之所願已得成就，天雨種種諸微妙香已，有不可計眾生，恭敬叉手，
translation: Having fulfilled your vow, the heavenly rain of various subtle fragrances greeted innumerable sentient beings with their palms joined.

source_sentence: 發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，是故號汝為師子香。
translation: You give rise to the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment, so you're called the lion's fragrance.

source_sentence: 汝於來世過一恒河沙等阿僧祇劫，入第二恒河沙等阿僧祇劫，上方去此四十二恒河沙世界微塵數等諸佛世界，
translation: In the future you will pass through as many eons as there are grains of sand in one Ganges River, entering as many eons as there are grains of sand in two Ganges Rivers. Above you will go upward and leave as many buddha-realms as there are atoms in forty-two worlds equal to the number of grains of sand in this continent.

source_sentence: 有世界名青香光明無垢，汝於彼土當得成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，號光明無垢堅香豐王如來、應供、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊。』
translation: There's a world named The Immaculate Light of green odor and the Immaculate Light of blue odor, in which you will attain unsurpassed, correct, perfect enlightenment in that land; it's called the Tathāgata of Immaculately Fragrant, Steadfast, Firmly Fragrant King of Light, Worthy of Offerings,

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 爾時，師子香菩薩禮寶藏如來頭面著地。
translation: It was then that the lion-incense bodhisattva paid homage to the Jeweled Treasury Tathāgata with his head and face on the ground.

source_sentence: 「『天人師起，　　受諸供養，
translation: 'The teacher of gods and humans arises, receives offerings,

source_sentence: 度脫生死，　　令離苦惱，
translation: They liberate beings from birth and death And cause them to be freed from suffering.

source_sentence: 斷諸結縛，　　及諸煩惱，
translation: He has cut off all bonds and afflictions, As well as all the defilements.

source_sentence: 來世當作，　　天人之尊。』
translation: In a future life, they'll be honored by gods and humans.'

source_sentence: 「爾時，如來為師子香菩薩而說偈言：「善男子！
translation: It was then that the Tathāgata spoke a verse to the lion-incense bodhisattva, saying, Good man!

source_sentence: 爾時，師子香菩薩聞是偈已，心大歡喜，即起合掌，去佛不遠，復坐聽法。
translation: Having heard these verses, the bodhisattva Siṃhalapradīpa was greatly delighted. Hearing them, he stood up with joined palms and, not far from the Buddha, resumed his seat to listen to the Dharma.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 爾時，寶海梵志復白第八王子泯圖言，乃至發心亦復如是。
translation: At the time, the Jewel-Sea Brahman again said to the eighth prince, Mañjuśrī, and so did he arouse his mind in the same way.

source_sentence: 爾時，王子前白佛言：『世尊！
translation: It was then that the prince went before the Buddha and said, 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我今所願，要當於是不淨世界修菩薩道，復當修治莊嚴十千不淨世界，
translation: What I wish for now is that you will cultivate the path of enlightening beings in these impure worlds and also purify ten thousand pure worlds.

source_sentence: 令其嚴淨如青香光明無垢世界，亦當教化無量菩薩，令心清淨無有垢穢，
translation: You should also lead and inspire innumerable enlightening beings so that their minds may be pure, without defilement.

source_sentence: 皆趣大乘，悉使充滿我之世界，然後我當成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: They all aspire to the great vehicle and make it fill my world, and after that I'll attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 願我修行菩薩道時，要當勝於餘諸菩薩。
translation: May I cultivate the bodhisattva path so that I'll be superior to other bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我已於七歲之中，端坐思惟諸佛菩薩清淨功德，及種種莊嚴佛土功德，
translation: At the age of seven I sat correctly contemplating the pure virtues of buddhas and enlightening beings, as well as the various adornments of buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 是時，即得悉見種種莊嚴三昧等萬一千菩薩三昧增進修行。
translation: At that point, they'll attain the cultivation of 10,000 bodhisattva samādhis like the various adornment samādhis and so forth in full view.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若未來諸菩薩等行菩薩道時，亦願悉得如是三昧。
translation: If future bodhisattvas and so forth will practice the bodhisattva path, they'll also wish to attain this kind of concentration.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 願我得出離三世勝幢三昧，以三昧力故，悉見十方無量無邊諸佛世界，
translation: “Furthermore, may I attain the state of concentration free from the supreme banners of all times. By the power of this state of concentration I see infinitely many buddha-lands in the ten directions.

source_sentence: 在在處處現在諸佛，出離三世，為諸眾生說於正法。
translation: Wherever there are buddhas in the present, they emerge from the three worlds and explain the right teaching to sentient beings.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 願我得不退三昧，以三昧力故，於一念中，悉見如微塵等諸佛菩薩及諸聲聞恭敬圍遶，
translation: “May I attain the state of nonregressing concentration and, by the power of that concentration, be able to see in a single thought as many buddhas, enlightening beings, bodhisattvas, and disciples as atoms surrounding me respectfully.

source_sentence: 願我於此一一佛所，得無依止三昧，以三昧力故，作變化身，一時遍至如一佛界微塵數等諸如來所，
translation: “Furthermore, to each of these buddhas may I attain the state of concentration free from defilement. By the power of this state, having transformed my body into a buddha-body, I may simultaneously reach as many buddhas as there are atoms in one buddha-land:

source_sentence: 供養禮拜，願我一一身以種種無上珍寶、華香、塗香、末香、妙勝伎樂種種莊嚴，
translation: May each of my bodies be adorned with various kinds of jewels, flowers, perfumes, ointments, powdered incense, and exquisite music.

source_sentence: 供養一一諸佛。
translation: They make offerings to each of the buddhas.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 願我一一身於一一佛所，如大海水渧等劫行菩薩道。
translation: May I practice the bodhisattva path for an eon like a great ocean of eons with one body at each buddha's place.

source_sentence: 願我得一切身變化三昧，以三昧力故，於一念中在一一佛前，知如一佛土微塵數等諸佛世界。
translation: May I attain the samādhi of all body transformations, and because of the power of that concentration, in a single thought before each Buddha I know as many buddha-realms as there are atoms in a single buddha-land.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 願我得功德力三昧，以三昧力故於一一佛前，遍到如一佛土微塵數等諸世尊所，
translation: “May I attain concentration called ‘samādhi of the power of virtue’ and, by the power of this concentration, go before each buddha as many world-honored ones as atoms in one buddha-land.

source_sentence: 以微妙讚歎讚歎諸佛。
translation: With subtle praise, he praises the buddhas.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 願我得不眴三昧，以三昧力故，於一念中，悉見諸佛遍滿十方無量無邊世界之中。
translation: May I attain the concentration of not being angry, and by the power of that concentration, in a single thought see all the buddhas pervading measureless and limitless worlds in the ten directions.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 願我得無諍三昧，以三昧力故，於一念中，悉見過去未來現在諸佛所有淨妙世界。
translation: May I attain the samādhi of no anger, and by the power of that samādhi, in a single thought see all the pure and marvelous worlds of past, future, and present buddhas.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 願我得首楞嚴三昧，以三昧力故，化作地獄之身入地獄中，與地獄眾生說微妙法，
translation: May I attain the samādhi of śūraṃgama-samādhi, whereby by the power of concentration I magically create a hell body and go into hell to teach the subtle Dharma to sentient beings in hell.

source_sentence: 勸令發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心；
translation: “Great enlightening beings develop the aspiration for unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 彼諸眾生聞是法已，尋發無上菩提之心，即便命終生於人中，隨所生處，
translation: Those sentient beings who hear this teaching will seek the supreme determination for enlightenment, and they’ll be born among humans wherever they are born at the end of their life.

source_sentence: 常得值佛，隨所值佛，而得聽法，聽受法已，即得住於不退轉地。
translation: He always meets buddhas, listens to the teaching wherever he meets them, and after listening to the teaching, he attains abiding in the stage of nonretrogression.

source_sentence: 乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人非人等、天、龍、鬼神、夜叉、羅剎、毘舍遮、富單那、伽吒富單那、屠殺、魁膾、商賈、婬女、畜生、餓鬼，
translation: They are gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans and nonhumans, gods, dragons, ghosts, yakṣas, rāṣas, piśācīs, pūtanas, kaṭa-puṇṇas, butchery, hungry ghosts, merchants, prostitutes, women, animals,

source_sentence: 如是等眾亦復如是，皆令發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: So it is with these kinds of people, causing them all to give rise to the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 有諸眾生隨所生處得諸色像，我分之身如業所作，隨受苦樂及諸工巧，
translation: “Some sentient beings obtain forms and images according to where they are born. The self-part of their bodies are like deeds, accompanied by pain and pleasure as well as the arts and crafts.

source_sentence: 願我變化作如是身，隨其所作而教化之。
translation: May I transform myself into such a body, teaching and transforming them according to what they do.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若有眾生各各異音，願我隨其種種音聲，而為說法各令歡喜，因其歡喜勸發安止，
translation: “Furthermore, if there are any sentient beings who have different voices, may I follow their various voices and teach the Dharma to them, enabling each to be joyful. And as a result of those joys may I induce them to settle in peace.

source_sentence: 令其不退於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: He causes them not to regress from unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我要當教十千佛土所有眾生，令心清淨，無有行業煩惱諸毒，乃至不令一人屬於四魔，
translation: I should teach all the sentient beings of the ten thousand buddha-lands so that their minds will be pure, free of the poisons of passions and afflictions, not even a single person belonging to one of the four Māras.

source_sentence: 何況多也。
translation: How could it be many?

source_sentence: 若我莊嚴十千佛土如是清淨，如光明無垢尊香王佛青香光明無垢世界，
translation: If my adornment of the ten thousand buddha-lands were as pure as this, it would be like the undefiled world of radiant and spotless fragrant light of the Buddha Great King of Fragrance.

source_sentence: 所有種種微妙莊嚴，然後我身及諸眷屬，乃當如彼師子香菩薩之所願也。
translation: The various subtle adornments that they have, then my body and my retinues will be like the wishes of that lion's fragrance bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若我所願成就得己利者，當令十千諸佛世界所有眾生斷諸苦惱，得柔軟心，
translation: If I fulfill my vows for self-benefit, I will cause all sentient beings in the ten thousand buddha-lands to be freed from suffering and attain gentleness of mind.

source_sentence: 得調伏心，各各自於四天下界，見佛世尊現在說法，一切眾生自然而得種種珍寶、華香、末香及以塗香，
translation: In each of the four continents they saw the Buddha, the World-honored One, expounding the Teaching to them. All sentient beings were naturally endowed with various rare treasures, such as precious jewels, flowers, fragrances, powdered incense, ointments, and perfumes.

source_sentence: 種種衣服，種種幢幡，各各以用供養於佛，供養佛已，悉發無上菩提之心。
translation: Various kinds of clothing and various kinds of banners and pennants were offered each to the Buddha, and after making offerings to him, they all aroused the mind of unsurpassed enlightenment.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等今者以悉得見種種莊嚴三昧力故，皆得遙見如是諸事。』
translation: Now, because of the power of the various adornments and samādhis that we've all seen, we'll all be able to see such things from afar.'

source_sentence: 作是語已，尋如所願，悉得見之。
translation: Having said these words, they searched for what they wished and saw them all.

source_sentence: 「爾時，世尊讚阿彌具言：『善哉！
translation: At that point, the Bhagavān praised Amitâbha and said, 'Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Excellent, good!

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝今世界周匝四面一萬佛土清淨莊嚴，於未來世，復當教化無量眾生令心清淨，
translation: Your world now is surrounded on all four sides by ten thousand buddha-lands, pure and beautifully adorned. In the future you will also lead and inspire innumerable sentient beings to purify their minds.

source_sentence: 復當供養無量無邊諸佛世尊。
translation: You should also make offerings to measureless and limitless buddhas and world-honored ones.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 以是緣故，今改汝字名為普賢，於未來世過一恒河沙等阿僧祇劫，入第二恒河沙等阿僧祇劫，
translation: For this reason, I now change your name to Samantabhadra and call it Samantabhadra. In the future more than one incalculably long eon equal to the number of grains of sands in the Ganges River will enter into a second incalculably long eon equal to the number of grains of sands in the Ganges River.

source_sentence: 末後分中於北方界，去此世界過六十恒河沙等佛土，有世界名知水善淨功德，
translation: In the latter part, in the northern realm, beyond this world and past as many buddha-lands as there are grains of sand in sixty Ganges Rivers, is a world called Water Knowledge that’s pure and good.

source_sentence: 汝當於中成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，號智剛吼自在相王如來、應、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊。』
translation: In this, you will attain supreme perfect enlightenment, which is called the Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One, Perfect in Knowledge and Conduct, Well-gone, Understander of the World, Unsurpassed, Tamer of Humans, Teacher of Devas and Humans, Buddha, Bhagavān.'

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 爾時，普賢菩薩摩訶薩頭面著地禮寶藏佛。
translation: It was then that the Samantabhadra Bodhisattva Mahāsattva bowed his head and face to the Buddha of the Jeweled Treasury on the ground.

source_sentence: 「『汝起善導師，　　已得如所願，
translation: 'You must give rise to a good teacher who has attained what you wish.

source_sentence: 善能調眾生，　　皆令得一心，
translation: They can skillfully tame sentient beings And cause them all to attain unity of mind.

source_sentence: 度於煩惱河，　　及脫諸惡法，
translation: He crosses the river of afflictions and liberates himself from bad qualities.

source_sentence: 來世作燈明，　　諸天世人師。』
translation: In a future life, he'll make a lamp of light, which will be the teacher of gods and humans.'

source_sentence: 「爾時，如來即為普賢菩薩而說偈言：「善男子！
translation: It was then that the Tathāgata spoke a verse for Samantabhadra Bodhisattva, saying, Good sons!

source_sentence: 爾時，會中有十千人心生懈怠，異口同音作如是言：『世尊！
translation: Ten thousand people in the assembly then became lazy and said, 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等來世即於如是嚴淨佛土，成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，所謂普賢菩薩所修清淨諸世界也。
translation: In the future, we'll attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment in such an adorned Buddha land, which is called the pure world cultivated by Samantabhadra Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等要當具足修六波羅蜜，以具足六波羅蜜故，各各於諸佛土成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。』
translation: We must fully cultivate the six perfections, and because we are fully endowed with the six perfections, each of us will attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment in the buddha-lands.'

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 爾時，寶藏如來即便為是十千人等，授阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記：『善男子！
translation: At the time, the Ratnaketu Tathāgata even gave assurance of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment to these 10,000 people, saying, 'Good man!

source_sentence: 普賢菩薩成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提時，汝等當於普賢菩薩所修清淨萬佛土中，
translation: “When the enlightening being Universally Good attains unexcelled, complete perfect enlightenment, you should cultivate purity in the myriad buddha-lands of universal good.

source_sentence: 一時成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，有一千佛同號智熾尊音王如來、應供、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊。
translation: At one time he attained anuttarii samyaksarrzbodhi, and there were 1,000 buddhas all called the Tathāgata, Worthy of Offerings, Perfectly Enlightened, Perfect in Knowledge and Conduct, Well-gone, Understander of the World, Unsurpassed, Tamer of Humans, Teacher of Devas and Humans, Buddha, Bhagavān.

source_sentence: 復有千佛同號增相尊音王，復有千佛同號善無垢尊音王，復有千佛同號離怖畏尊音王，
translation: Again, a thousand buddhas sang the same name as King of Venerable Sound Increasing Characteristics; another thousand sang the same name as King of Venerable Sound Good Undefiled; and another thousand sang the same name as King of Venerable Sound Free From Fear.

source_sentence: 復有千佛同號善無垢光尊音王，復有千五百佛同號日音王，復有五百佛同號日寶藏尊王，
translation: There were also one thousand buddhas, all called King of Sound of the Sun; another five hundred buddhas, all called King of the Jewel Treasury of the Sun; a thousand buddhas, all called King of Sound of Virtuous Undefiled Light.

source_sentence: 復有五佛同號樂音尊王，復有二佛同號日光明，復有四佛同號龍自在，
translation: Again, the five buddhas sang the same name to each other as “Sound of Delight in Virtue.” There were also two buddhas who sang the same name as Sunlike Light.

source_sentence: 復有八佛同號離恐怖稱王光明，復有十佛同號離音光明，復有八佛同號音聲稱，
translation: Again, there was the light of the eight buddhas simultaneously called “Abandonment of Fearlessness” and “Kingdom of Fame.” There was also the light of the ten buddhas simultaneously called “Abandonment of Sounds” and “Soundlessness” and the eight buddhas simultaneously called “Soundlessness”.

source_sentence: 復有十一佛同號顯露法音，復有九佛同號功德法稱王，復有二十佛同號不可思議王，
translation: Then there were eleven more buddhas, all called the same name as revealing the Teaching; nine more buddhas, all called the same name as King of Virtuous Dharma; and twenty more buddhas, all called the same name as Inconceivable King.

source_sentence: 復有四十佛同號寶幢光明尊王，復有一佛號覺知尊想王，復有七佛同號不可思議音，
translation: Again, there were forty buddhas all called the same name: Jewel Banner Light King. There was another buddha named King Enlightened One who perceived the supreme ideation of enlightenment. And seven other buddhas all called Unfathomable Sound.

source_sentence: 復有三佛同號智藏，復有十五佛同號智山幢，復有五十佛同號智海王，
translation: There were also the three buddhas of the same name named Jetagarbha, the five buddhas of the same name named Brahmakāyika, the ten buddhas of the same name named Sudarśana, the eighteen buddhas of the same name named Mahāprajñāpāramitā, the thirty-six buddhas of the same name named Samādhinir

source_sentence: 復有三十佛同號大力尊音王，復有二佛同號山功德劫，復有八十佛同號清淨智勤，
translation: Again, there were thirty buddhas all called Maheśvaravyūha; two buddhas all called the world age of mountains of virtue; and eighty buddhas all called the world age of pure energy.

source_sentence: 復有九十佛同號尊相種王，復有百佛同號善智無垢雷音尊王，復有八十佛同號勝尊大海功德智山力王，
translation: There were also ninety buddhas all called the same name as the king of the royal lineage of honored characteristics, one hundred more buddhas all called the same name as the venerable king Sound of Undefiled Thunder of Good Wisdom, and another eighty buddhas all called the same name as King of the Mountain Power of Knowledge of the Great Ocean of Virtue of the Supreme Honored One.

source_sentence: 復有四十佛同號無上菩提尊王，復有二佛同號智覺山華王，復有二佛同號功德山智覺，
translation: There were also forty buddhas all called the same name as the honored king Unsurpassed Enlightenment, two buddhas all called the same name as Zhijue Mountain Flower King, and two buddhas all called the same name as Shanzhijue on the mountain of Virtue.

source_sentence: 復有三佛同號金剛師子，復有二佛同號持戒光明，復有二佛同號示現增益，
translation: Again, there were three buddhas called the same name as Vajra Lion. Again, there were two buddhas called the same name to preserve the light of morality. Again, there were two buddhas called the same name to show increasing benefit.

source_sentence: 復有一佛號無量光明，復有三佛同號師子遊戲，復有二佛同號無盡智山，
translation: Again, there was a buddha named Immeasurable Light. Again, there were three buddhas together called Lion’s Recreation. Again, there were two buddhas together called Inexhaustible Mountain of Knowledge.

source_sentence: 復有二佛同號寶光明，復有二佛同號無垢智慧，復有九佛同號智慧光明，
translation: There were also two buddhas named Jewel Light and two buddhas named Immaculate Wisdom, and there were also nine buddhas named Light of Knowledge.

source_sentence: 復有二佛同號師子稱，復有二佛同號功德通王，復有二佛同號雨法華，
translation: There were also two buddhas called the same name as Siṃhala; there were also two buddhas called the same name as Indra; there were also two buddhas called the same name as King Mahaprajnaparamita; and there were also two buddhas called the same name as raining the Lotus.

source_sentence: 復有一佛號造光明，復有一佛號增益山王，復有一佛號出法無垢王，復有一佛號香尊王，
translation: Again, there was a buddha named King of Illumination; another buddha named King of Immeasurable Light; another buddha named King of Mountains; another buddha named King of Law Enlightenment; and another buddha named King of Fragrance.

source_sentence: 復有一佛號無垢目，復有一佛號大寶藏，復有一佛號力無障閡王，復有一佛號自知功德力，
translation: Then there was another buddha named Undefiled Eye, another buddha named Great Jewel Treasury, another buddha named King of Unobstructed Power, and another buddha named Knowing Yourselves the Power of Virtue.

source_sentence: 復有一佛號衣服知足，復有一佛號得自在，復有一佛號無障閡利益，復有一佛號智慧藏，
translation: “Furthermore, there is another buddha named contented with knowledge of clothing; another buddha named self-dependence; another buddha named unobstructed benefit; and another buddha named treasury of wisdom.

source_sentence: 復有一佛號大山王，復有一佛號曰力藏，復有一佛號求功德，復有一佛號華幢枝，
translation: Then there was another buddha named Great King of Mountains, another buddha named Power Treasury, another buddha named Seeking Virtue, and another buddha named Flower Banner Branch.

source_sentence: 復有一佛號眾光明，復有一佛號無癡功德王，復有一佛號金剛上，復有一佛號曰法相，
translation: Again, there was a buddha named King of All Lights. Again, there was a buddha named King of the Virtues of Non-cognisance. Again, there was a buddha named Vajraśekhara. Again, there was a buddha named Dharmapāda.

source_sentence: 復有一佛號尊音王，復有一佛號堅持金剛，復有一佛號珍寶自在王，復有一佛號堅自然幢，
translation: Again, there was a buddha named King of Honorable Sound. Again, there was a buddha named insisting on the diamond. Again, there was a buddha named independent king of treasures and jewels. Again, there was a buddha named naturally standing banner.

source_sentence: 復有一佛號山劫，復有一佛號雨娛樂，復有一佛號增益善法，復有一佛號娑羅王，
translation: Again, there was a buddha named Shankalpa (Mountain age), another buddha named雨娛樂, another buddha named Increasing Good Dharma, and another buddha namedsara king.

source_sentence: 復有二佛同號功德遍滿大海功德王，復有一佛號智慧和合，復有一佛號智熾，
translation: Again, there were two buddhas named Virtue Pervading the Ocean of Virtue and King of Virtue. Again, there was a buddha named Wisdom Harmonizing with Oneness. Again, there was a buddha named Burning with Knowledge.

source_sentence: 復有一佛號華眾，復有一佛號世間尊，復有一佛號優曇鉢華幢，復有一佛號法幢自在王，
translation: Then there was another buddha named Lotus Assembly, another buddha named World Honored One, another buddha named Udrapadmavyūha, and another buddha named Dharma Banner sovereign King.

source_sentence: 復有一佛號栴檀王，復有一佛號善住，復有一佛號精進力，復有一佛號幢等光明，
translation: There was another buddha named Sandalwood King, another buddha named Sunetra, another buddha named Energy Power, another buddha named Banner, and so forth.

source_sentence: 復有一佛號曰智步，復有一佛號曰海幢，復有一佛號滅法稱，復有一佛號壞魔王，
translation: Then there was another buddha named Zhixiang, another buddha named Huibao, another buddha named Haizhang, another buddha named Daishi fashi, and another buddha named King of Destruction of Māra.

source_sentence: 復有一佛號眾光明，復有一佛號出智光明，復有一佛號曰慧燈，復有一佛號安隱王，
translation: Again, there was a buddha named All Lights. Again, there was a buddha named Producing the Light of Knowledge. Again, there was a buddha named Lamp of Wisdom. Again, there was a buddha named King of Peace.

source_sentence: 復有一佛號曰智音，復有一佛號幢攝取，復有一佛號天金剛，復有一佛號種種莊嚴王，
translation: Then there was another buddha named Wise Sound, another buddha named Banner of Inclusion, another buddha named Celestial Diamond, and another buddha named Various Adornments King.

source_sentence: 復有一佛號無勝智，復有一佛號善住意，復有一佛號月王，復有一佛號無勝步自在王，
translation: Again, there was a buddha named King of Unsurpassed Knowledge. Again, there was a buddha named King of Good Mindfulness. Again, there was a buddha named King of the Moon. Again, there was a buddha named King of Independently Acting Sovereign One.

source_sentence: 復有一佛號娑憐陀王，復有八十佛同號師子步王，復有五十佛同號那羅延無勝藏，
translation: Again, there was a buddha named Sadāṇḍa King. Again, there were eighty buddhas all called Siṃhadhvaja kings. Again, there were fifty buddhas all called Nārayanamukhavyūha.

source_sentence: 復有七十佛同號聚集珍寶功德，復有三十佛同號光明藏，復有二十佛同號分別星宿稱王，
translation: There were also seventy buddhas called the same name to gather treasures and virtues, thirty buddhas called the same name to store of light, and twenty buddhas called the same name to discern the stars and constellations as kings.

source_sentence: 復有二佛同號功德力娑羅王，復有九十佛同號微妙音，復有一佛號曰梵增，
translation: Again, there were the two buddhas named Samantabhadra and Brahmadatta together in the name of King Indra. There were also ninety buddhas named Mahāprajñāpāramitā together in the name Brahmā.

source_sentence: 復有一佛號提頭賴吒王，復有千佛同號蓮華香擇稱尊王，復有六十佛同號光明熾渚王，
translation: Then there was another buddha named King Dhṛtarāṣṭra, a thousand buddhas called the same name as the honored king Lotus Blossom Fragrance Treasury, and another 60 buddhas called the same name as Radiant Shining Isle King.

source_sentence: 復有三十佛同號蓮華香力增，復有二佛同號無量功德大海智增，復有一佛號閻浮陰，
translation: Again, there were thirty buddhas all called lotus flowers with the power of fragrance increasing. Again, there were two buddhas all called immeasurable oceans of virtues and great knowledge growing. Again, there was a buddha named Jambudvlpa;

source_sentence: 復有一百二佛同號功德山幢，復有一佛號師子相，復有一百一佛同號龍雷尊華光明王，
translation: Again, there were one hundred and two buddhas named the same name as the Mountain Banner of Virtue. There was another buddha named Lion-Shaped Buddha. Another hundred and one buddhas named the same name as the Flower King of Light of the Great Thunder of the Dragon.

source_sentence: 復有一佛號善趣種無我甘露功德王劫，復有千佛同號離法智龍王解脫覺世界海眼山王，
translation: There was also a buddha named King of the Ocean-eyed Mountain King of the Selfless ambrosia of Virtue of the Cultivation of Good destinies, and there were another thousand buddhas with the same name, Free from Dharma, Wisdom, Dragon King, Liberation, and Enlightenment.

source_sentence: 皆有十號如來、應、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊。
translation: They all have the ten names of Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One, Perfect in Knowledge and Conduct, Perfect in Knowledge and Conduct, Well-gone, Understander of the World, Unsurpassed, Tamer of Humans, Teacher of Gods and People, Buddha, Bhagavān.

source_sentence: 如是等佛，同共一日一時，各各於諸世界成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，壽命各十中劫，
translation: Each of these buddhas accomplished unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment in all worlds at the same time, each with a lifespan of ten intermediate kalpas.

source_sentence: 卿等涅槃亦同一日，般涅槃已，所有正法七日即滅。』
translation: Your nirvāṇa will also be the same day, and after parinirvāṇa, all of your right teachings will cease on the seventh day.'

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 爾時，十千人向寶藏佛頭面作禮。
translation: Ten thousand people then bowed their heads and faces to the jeweled treasure-store Buddha.

source_sentence: 「『龍王汝起，　　堅固自在，
translation: 'Noble dragon king, you arise firm and unimpeded.

source_sentence: 無上善願，　　清淨和合，
translation: Unexcelled good vows, pure and harmonious,

source_sentence: 卿等用意，　　疾如猛風，
translation: Your minds are as swift as a gale.

source_sentence: 精勤修學，　　六波羅蜜，
translation: He diligently cultivates the six transcendent ways.

source_sentence: 來世必成，　　天人之尊。』
translation: In a future life, he'll surely become the honored one of gods and humans.'

source_sentence: 「爾時，世尊為十千人而說偈言：「善男子！
translation: At the time, the Bhagavān spoke a verse for 10,000 people, saying, Good man!

source_sentence: 爾時，十千人聞是偈已，心生歡喜，即起合掌，前禮佛足，去佛不遠，
translation: Having heard these verses, the ten thousand bhikṣus were greatly delighted. They stood up with joined palms and bowed at the Buddha’s feet, not far from him.

source_sentence: 復坐聽法。
translation: Again, he sat and listened to the teaching.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 爾時，寶海梵志復白第九王子蜜蘇言，乃至發心亦復如是。
translation: At the time, the Jewel-Sea Brahman again said to the ninth prince, honey and so forth, and so did he arouse his mind.

source_sentence: 爾時，王子前白佛言：『世尊！
translation: It was then that the prince went before the Buddha and said, 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我行菩薩道時，願十方如恒河沙等世界所有現在諸佛為我作證，今於佛前發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: When I'm practicing the bodhisattva path, may all the present buddhas of the worlds in the ten directions like the sands of the Ganges River be my witnesses, and now I give rise to the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment in front of the Buddha.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 願我行菩薩道時，乃至成佛，於其中間不生悔心，乃至成佛，常住一心，
translation: “May I practice the path of enlightening beings and attain buddhahood, without any thought of regret or remorse; may I always be singleminded in my mind while practicing the path of enlightening beings, until I become a buddha.

source_sentence: 無有退轉，如說而行，如行而說，乃至無有一人來惱我心，更不求於聲聞、緣覺，
translation: There is no turning back, just as I have been taught, and just as I have been taught, not even a single person comes to disturb me. I do not seek the path of śrāvakas or pratyekabuddhas.

source_sentence: 不起婬欲、惡想之心，其心不與睡眠、憍慢、疑悔等共，亦復不生貪婬、殺盜、妄言、兩舌、惡口、綺語、貪恚、邪見、嫉妬、慢法、欺誑之心。
translation: They don't give rise to thoughts of sexual desire or bad thoughts, and their minds aren't shared with sleep, arrogance, doubt, regret, etc., nor do they give rise to thoughts of greed, killing, stealing, false speech, duplicitous speech, harsh words, fancy speech, greed, wrong views, jealousy, conceit,

source_sentence: 我修菩薩道，乃至成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，中間不生如是等法，乃至成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提行時，
translation: I cultivate the path of enlightening beings until I attain unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment, yet do not produce anything like this in between.

source_sentence: 步步心心數法常念諸佛，得見諸佛，諮受妙法，供養眾僧，於諸生處常願出家，
translation: “Great enlightening beings are always mindful of the principles of buddha-teachings; they see all buddhas, receive instruction in the sublime Teaching, and pay their respects to the Sangha. In all living beings everywhere they always wish to leave home.

source_sentence: 當出家時，即得成就糞掃三衣，常在樹下獨坐思惟，住阿蘭若，常行乞食，
translation: When he leaves home, he immediately accomplishes the three garments of sweeping dung and excrement. He always sits alone under a tree to meditate, abiding in a forest-dwelling retreat, often going begging for food.

source_sentence: 不求利養，行於知足，常講說法，成就無量無障閡辯，不犯大罪。
translation: He doesn't seek profit, practices with contentment, always expounds the Dharma, accomplishes measureless and unobstructed eloquence, and doesn't commit a great sin.

source_sentence: 不以我相為女人說法，若說法時，恒以空相，其心常念空無之法，拱手端坐，
translation: They do not teach the Dharma to women in terms of self or characteristics. When they teach the Dharma, they always depict emptiness as emptiness. Their minds always think of emptiness as nonexistence; they sit cross-legged with their palms joined.

source_sentence: 亦不露齒。
translation: Nor does he reveal his teeth.

source_sentence: 若有學習大乘之人而於其所起世尊想，恭敬供養，所聞法處亦起佛想，
translation: “Furthermore, if there are those who study Mahayana teachings and give rise to conceptions of world-honored ones in respect and reverence and offerings to them, they will also give rise to conceptions of buddhahood wherever they hear the Teaching.

source_sentence: 於諸沙門婆羅門中，故生恭敬、供養、尊重，除佛世尊。
translation: Among the śramaṇas and brāhmaṇas, respect, offerings, and veneration arise out of respect for them, except for the Bhagavān.

source_sentence: 於諸眾中，不生分別此是福田、此非福田而行布施，願我不於法施人所生嫉妬心。
translation: Among the assembled people, they don't discriminate between what's a field of merit and what's not a field of merit and practice generosity, wishing that I won't become jealous of someone who gives the Dharma.

source_sentence: 若有眾生應被刑戮，願我捨命以救護之。
translation: If there are any sentient beings who should be tortured and killed, may I give up my life to rescue them.

source_sentence: 若有眾生犯於諸罪，願我以力言說錢財，而拔濟之，令得解脫。
translation: If there are any sentient beings who commit sins, may I use my power of speech and money to rescue them so that they will attain liberation.

source_sentence: 若有在家出家之人有諸罪過，願不發露顯現於人，於諸利養名譽等中而常遠離，
translation: If there are laymen or renunciants with sins and faults, may they not reveal them to others, and always be far removed from such things as profit and fame.

source_sentence: 如避火坑、刀劒毒樹。
translation: It's like avoiding a burning pit or a poisonous tree with a sword.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若我此願，乃至成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，悉得成就，如今佛前之所願者，
translation: If these vows of mine had all been fulfilled, I would have attained unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 令我兩手自然而有千輻天輪，所得光明如火猛焰。』
translation: It causes my two hands to naturally have a thousand-spoked celestial wheel, which obtains light like the fierce flame of a fire.'

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 是時王子說是語已，其兩手中即尋各有一千輻輪，如說而得。
translation: After the prince said these words, he found a thousand-spoked wheel in each of his hands and got it as he had been told.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若我所願成就逮得己利，成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提者，我今遣此千輻天輪，
translation: If I accomplish what I wish to achieve for my own benefit and attain highest, complete enlightenment, I will now send this one-thousand-spoked celestial wheel.

source_sentence: 至於無佛五濁世界，是輪當作如是大聲遍滿佛土，如難陀龍王、優波難陀龍王，
translation: As for the Buddhaless world of the five turbidities, this wheel would make such a loud sound pervading all buddha-lands like Nanda and Upananda.

source_sentence: 作大音聲遍滿世界，其輪音聲亦復如是，所謂菩薩受記音聲、不失專念智慧之聲、修學空法諸佛所有法藏之聲，
translation: The sound of the great voice pervading all worlds is also like this: the voice of enlightening beings receiving assurance of enlightenment, the voice of unfailingly concentrated knowledge and wisdom, the voice of the treasury of teachings of buddhas who practice emptiness.

source_sentence: 若有眾生在在處處聞是法聲，即時得斷貪欲、瞋恚、愚癡、憍慢、慳悋、嫉妬，
translation: If there are sentient beings everywhere who hear the sound of this teaching, they’ll immediately be freed from craving, anger, folly, arrogance, stinginess, and jealousy.

source_sentence: 而得寂靜思惟諸佛甚深智慧，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。』
translation: They attain the profound wisdom of quietly contemplating the buddhas and give rise to the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.'

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 爾時，王子即遣二輪，譬如諸佛神足捷疾，其輪去疾亦復如是，遍至十方無佛惡世，
translation: The prince then dismissed the two wheels, analogous to the swiftness of the Buddha’s supernormal power of traveling in the ten directions. Likewise, his departure from the wheel was also like this:

source_sentence: 為諸眾生出諸菩薩受記音聲、不失專念智慧之聲、修學空法諸佛所有法藏之聲，
translation: For the sake of sentient beings, he produces the sounds of enlightening beings’ assurance of enlightenment, the sound of unfailing concentration on knowledge and wisdom, the sound of cultivation of emptiness, and the sounds of all buddhas’ stores of teaching.

source_sentence: 在在處處諸眾生等聞是法音，即便得斷貪欲、瞋恚、愚癡、憍慢、慳悋、嫉妬，
translation: When sentient beings everywhere hear this teaching, they'll be able to stop craving, anger, folly, pride, conceit, stinginess, and jealousy.

source_sentence: 而得寂靜思惟諸佛甚深智慧，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，其輪須臾還來在此王子前住。
translation: They attain quiescence, contemplate the profound wisdom of the buddhas, and give rise to the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment, and their wheels return in a moment's time to stay here in front of the prince.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 爾時，寶藏如來讚王子言：『善哉！
translation: It was then that the Ratnaketu Tathāgata praised the prince, saying, 'Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Excellent, good!

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝行菩薩道所發善願無上最妙，遣此天輪至於無佛五濁之世，令無量無邊阿僧祇億百千眾生，
translation: Your practice of the path of enlightening beings is unexcelled and supremely wonderful, your vows of goodness undertaken on the path of enlightening beings. Reject this celestial wheel to a world without buddhahood, with its five turbidities, so as to cause immeasurable, boundless, incalculable millions of sentient beings to at

source_sentence: 安止住於無穢濁心，心無惱害，勸化發於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，以是故今改汝名為阿閦，
translation: Abiding calmly in a mind free of defilement, his mind without vexation, he encourages and inspires the attainment of unexcelled, perfect enlightenment. For this reason you are now changed to Anavatapta.

source_sentence: 於未來世當為世尊，汝今當於佛前，如心所喜，願取種種莊嚴佛土。』
translation: In the future, you will be the Bhagavān, and now you'll be in front of the Buddha, just as your heart delights it, wishing to take various adornments of the Buddha-lands.'

source_sentence: 「爾時阿閦白佛言：『世尊！
translation: It was then that Akṣobhya said to the Buddha, 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我今所願如是種種莊嚴佛土，令我世界純金為地，地平如掌，多有種種諸天妙寶遍滿其國，
translation: I now wish that all these various adornments of the buddha-lands will cause my world to be pure gold, with a ground as flat as the palms of my hands and many kinds of celestial jewels pervading it.

source_sentence: 無有山陵、垖阜、土沙、礫石、荊蕀之屬，其地柔軟，譬如天衣，行時足下蹈入四寸，
translation: The ground is as soft as a heavenly garment, four inches in circumference at the time of its movement.

source_sentence: 舉足還復。
translation: He raised his legs and returned.

source_sentence: 無有地獄、畜生、餓鬼，不淨臭穢，純有諸天微妙上香，及曼陀羅、摩訶曼陀羅華遍滿其國。
translation: There are no hells, animals, or hungry ghosts, impure and foul-smelling, pure with the subtle and wonderful fragrance of gods, as well as maṇḍala and mahāmandārava flowers pervading their country.

source_sentence: 所有眾生無有老病，各各自在不相畏怖，常不惱他，命不中殀。
translation: All sentient beings have no old age or illness, are each present and not afraid of each other, always don't harm others, and their lives aren't interrupted.

source_sentence: 臨捨命時，心無悔恨，其心決定，無有錯亂，繫念思惟諸佛如來。
translation: When he was about to relinquish his life, his mind had no regrets or resentment, and his mind was determined without confusion, fixing his thoughts on the buddha-tathāgatas.

source_sentence: 若命終已，不墮惡道，不生無佛五濁惡世，乃至成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，
translation: When their life ends, they won’t fall into bad destinies, be born in the five turbid and evil worlds of buddhalessness, or even attain unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 常得見佛，諮受妙法，供養眾僧。
translation: They always saw the Buddha, inquired into his marvelous teachings, and offered support to the sangha.

source_sentence: 所有眾生，薄婬怒癡，皆行十善。
translation: All sentient beings who are weak in lust, anger, and delusion all perform the ten good deeds.

source_sentence: 世界無有種種工巧，無有犯罪及犯罪名，亦無天魔諸留難事，眾生受形無有惡色，
translation: The world has no various arts and skills, no crimes or names of crimes, no gods or Māras to harm it; sentient beings receive form without any bad form.

source_sentence: 亦不分別尊卑高下，一切眾生深解無我及無我所，聲聞、菩薩乃至夢中不失不淨，
translation: They do not discriminate between superior and inferior, high and low. All sentient beings deeply understand selflessness and what belongs to selflessness. Their disciples, bodhisattvas, and even in dreams they do not lose their purity.

source_sentence: 眾生常樂求法聽法，無有一人生於倒見，亦無外道。
translation: Sentient beings always delight in seeking the Dharma and listening to it, but there's no one who lives with mistaken views or non-Buddhists.

source_sentence: 眾生無有身心疲極，皆得五通，無有飢渴、諸苦惱事，隨所喜樂，種種食飲，
translation: All sentient beings have no physical or mental exhaustion, and all attain the five supernormal powers. They are not hungry or thirsty, nor suffer from pain or distress. They eat and drink in various ways according to their wishes and pleasures.

source_sentence: 即有寶器自然在手，有種種食，猶如欲界所有諸天。
translation: He then had a jeweled vessel naturally in his hand and had various foods, just like all the gods in the desire realm.

source_sentence: 無有涕唾、便利之患痰癊汗淚，亦無寒熱，常有柔軟香風觸身，此風香氣微妙具足，
translation: There is neither snot, nor spittle, nor blistering, nor exhalation, nor urinating; there is neither cold nor heat, and the body is always touched by a gentle breeze of fragrance. The fragrance of this breeze is subtle and complete.

source_sentence: 薰諸天人不須餘香，如是香風隨諸天人，所求冷溫皆使滿足。
translation: It perfumes the gods and humans without needing any other fragrance, and such a fragrant breeze follows the gods and humans to satisfy their needs for coolness and warmth.

source_sentence: 又復有求優鉢羅華香風，又復有求優陀娑羅香風，有求沈水香風，有求多伽羅香風，
translation: There was also a wind of fragrance seeking blue lotus blossoms, and there was another wind of fragrance seeking red lotus blossoms.

source_sentence: 有求阿伽羅香風，有求種種香風，如所悕望於發心時皆得成就，除五濁世。
translation: Those who seek the fragrance of agara and those who seek various fragrances will all attain it when they arouse their minds, except for the five turbid worlds.

source_sentence: 願我國土有七寶樓，其寶樓中敷七寶床，茵蓐丹枕細滑柔軟猶如天衣，
translation: In my land I wish that there will be a tower of the seven kinds of treasure. Within this tower are spread seven-jeweled beds, as soft and gentle as heavenly raiment.

source_sentence: 眾生處此寶樓床[木*翕]皆悉歡樂。
translation: The sentient beings in this jeweled tower bed [wooden* board] are all delighted.

source_sentence: 其樓四邊有好池水，其水具足有八功德，眾生隨意而取用之。
translation: On each of the four sides of the tower was a beautiful pond full of water, endowed with eight virtues that sentient beings could use as they wished.

source_sentence: 其國多有金多羅樹，種種華果妙香具足，上妙寶衣、種種寶蓋、真珠瓔珞而以莊嚴，
translation: In that country there were many golden palm trees, endowed with various kinds of flowers and fruit and exquisite fragrances, adorned with supremely beautiful precious raiment, various kinds of precious canopies, pearl necklaces, and jewelry.

source_sentence: 諸眾生等隨意所憙，妙寶衣服即於樹上自恣取著，華果香等亦復如是。
translation: When sentient beings and so forth follow their wishes, marvelous jeweled clothing are appropriated on a tree as freely as they like, and so are flowers, fruits, fragrances, and so forth.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 願我菩提之樹純是七寶，高千由旬，樹莖周匝滿一由旬，枝葉縱廣滿千由旬，
translation: May my tree of enlightenment be pure, made of the seven treasures, one thousand yojanas in height, with stems measuring one yojana in circumference and leaves measuring a thousand yojanas in length and breadth.

source_sentence: 常有微風吹菩提樹，其樹則出六波羅蜜、根、力、覺道微妙之聲，若有眾生聞此妙聲，
translation: There is always a gentle breeze blowing at the tree of enlightenment, and from that tree come forth the subtle sounds of the six transcendent ways, their faculties, powers, and paths of enlightenment. If any sentient beings hear those subtle sounds,

source_sentence: 一切皆得離於欲心。
translation: They'll all attain freedom from the mind of desire.

source_sentence: 所有女人成就一切諸妙功德，猶如兜術天上天女，無有婦人諸不淨事、兩舌、慳悋、嫉妬覆心；
translation: All the women there were endowed with all kinds of marvelous qualities, just like the celestial maidens in Tuṣita Heaven. There was no woman whose minds were covered by impure deeds, divisive speech, stinginess, or jealousy.

source_sentence: 不與男子漏心交通，若諸男子發婬欲心，至女人所以愛心視，須臾之間便離欲心，
translation: They won't talk to men with their contaminated minds, and if men give rise to sexual desire, the woman will be so attached to them that in a moment they'll become free of desire.

source_sentence: 自生厭離即便還去，尋得清淨無垢三昧。
translation: He becomes disillusioned with himself and leaves, returns, and then attains pure and undefiled concentration.

source_sentence: 以三昧力故，於諸魔縛而得解脫，更不復生惡欲之心。
translation: Because of the power of samādhi, he attains liberation from the bondage of Māra and doesn't again give rise to bad thoughts of desire.

source_sentence: 如是女人，若見男子有愛欲心，便得妊身，亦得離於婬欲之想。
translation: Thus, if a woman sees a man with craving and desire, she'll attain pregnancy, and she'll be free of the perception of sexual desire.

source_sentence: 當妊身時，若懷男女，身心無有諸苦惱事，常受快樂，如忉利天人身心所受上妙快樂。
translation: When they're pregnant, if they harbor a man or woman, their bodies and minds don't experience painful things, and they always experience happiness, just as the Trāyastriṃśa gods and humans experience marvelous happiness in body and mind.

source_sentence: 女人懷妊七日七夜，所受快樂亦復如是，亦如比丘入第二禪。
translation: So it is with a woman who's pregnant for seven days and nights, and the happiness she experiences is likewise, just as a monk enters the second dhyāna.

source_sentence: 處胎男女不為一切不淨所污，滿足七日即便出生，當其生時受諸快樂，
translation: The male and female bodies in the womb are not stained by anything impure. After seven days have passed, they are born. When they are born, they experience various pleasures.

source_sentence: 有微妙音，女人產時，亦無諸苦，如是母子俱共入水洗浴其身。
translation: There's a subtle sound that doesn't cause any pain when a woman gives birth, and thus mothers and children enter water together to bathe their bodies.

source_sentence: 是時女人得如是念，以念力故，尋得離欲清淨三昧，以三昧力故，其心常定，
translation: The woman then had this thought, and by the power of that thought she attained a pure concentration free of desire. Because of the power of that concentration, her mind was always concentrated.

source_sentence: 於諸魔縛而得解脫。
translation: They'll attain liberation from the bonds of Māra.

source_sentence: 若有眾生宿業成就，應無量世作女人身，以定力故，得離女身乃至涅槃，
translation: If there are sentient beings who have accomplished past actions, they should create the body of a woman for an infinite number of lifetimes. Because of their power of concentration, they will be able to part with the body of a woman and attain nirvana.

source_sentence: 一切女業永滅無餘，更不復受。
translation: All women's actions will cease forever without remainder, and they won't experience them again.

source_sentence: 或有眾生宿業成就，於無量億劫應處胞胎受苦惱者，願我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，
translation: “Furthermore, if there are any sentient beings who have accomplished past actions and will experience suffering in the womb for immeasurable millions of eons—May I attain unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 聞我名字即生歡喜，生歡喜已，尋便命終，處胎即生我之世界，尋於生已，
translation: Having heard my name, they will be delighted. Having been delighted, their life will end when they are born in the womb. They will be born in my world and after having been born there, they will find out where I am.

source_sentence: 所受胎分永盡無餘，乃至成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提更不受胎。
translation: The portion of the womb that's received is permanently exhausted without remainder, until it becomes unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment and no longer receives the womb.

source_sentence: 或有眾生多善根者，尋便得來至我世界蓮華中生。
translation: If there are sentient beings with many good roots, they'll be born among the lotus flowers in my world if they come to me.

source_sentence: 或有眾生少善根者，要當處胎，或受女人而生我界，然後乃得永盡胎分。
translation: If there are sentient beings with few good roots who will be born in the womb, or if they receive a woman and are born in the self realm, then they'll attain the eternal end of the part of the womb.

source_sentence: 所有眾生一向純受微妙快樂，微風吹此金多羅樹出微妙聲，所謂苦、空、無我、無常等聲，
translation: All the sentient beings there are simply experiencing subtle bliss, and a gentle breeze blows from this golden palm tree to produce subtle sounds like pain, emptiness, selflessness, impermanence, and so forth.

source_sentence: 聞是聲者，皆得光明三昧，以三昧力故，得諸空定甚深三昧，世界無有婬欲相聲。
translation: Those who hear this sound will all attain the concentration of light, and because of the power of that concentration, they'll attain the profound samādhi of the concentration of emptiness, where there's no sound of the characteristic of sexual desire in the world.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我坐菩提樹下，於一念中成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，願我世界無有日月光明晝夜差別，
translation: “I sit at the foot of an enlightenment tree. Having attained unexcelled, complete perfect enlightenment in a single thought, may my world be without distinction between day and night with the light of the sun and the moon.

source_sentence: 除華開合。
translation: It's except for the opening and closing of flowers.

source_sentence: 我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，當以光明遍照三千大千世界，以光明力故，
translation: Having attained unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment, I will illumine a thousand great chiliocosms with the power of my light.

source_sentence: 令諸眾生悉得天眼，以天眼故，得見十方無量無邊諸佛世界，在在處處諸佛世尊現在說法。
translation: It causes all sentient beings to attain the divine eye, and because of that divine eye, they can see measureless and limitless buddha-realms in the ten directions, wherever there are buddhas and world-honored ones presently teaching.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，說於正法令此音聲遍滿三千大千世界，眾生聞者得念佛三昧。
translation: After I've attained unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment, I teach this sound of right teaching that fills 3,000 great one-thousand worlds, and sentient beings who hear it attain the samādhi of mindfulness of the Buddha.

source_sentence: 眾生或有行住迴轉，隨所方面常得見我，若於諸法有疑滯處，以見我故，
translation: Sentient beings sometimes have formations, abodes, and evolving states. They always see the self in whatever direction they may be. Those who are doubtful about things because they see the self...

source_sentence: 即得斷疑。
translation: That's when he attains the ability to remove doubt.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，十方無量無邊阿僧祇諸佛世界，在在處處所有眾生，
translation: “Once I have attained unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment, the buddha-fields in the ten directions are infinite, boundless, endless, and incalculable. All sentient beings everywhere there belong to them.

source_sentence: 若學聲聞、若學緣覺、若學大乘，聞我名者，命終要來生我世界，若聲聞人聞我法者，
translation: Those who study the śrāvakas, those who study pratyekabuddhas and those who study the Mahayana and hear my name will be born in my world at the end of their lives.

source_sentence: 得八解脫阿羅漢果，學大乘人聞我法者，得深法忍陀羅尼門及諸三昧，
translation: Attaining the fruit of arhatship of the eight liberations, those who study the Great Vehicle and hear my teachings will attain profound tolerance of phenomena, dhāraṇī practices, and concentrations.

source_sentence: 不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，得無量聲聞以為眷屬，其數無邊無能數者，
translation: They do not regress from unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment, and attain the assembly of immeasurable disciples as their retinues—their number is boundless and incalculable.

source_sentence: 唯除諸佛。
translation: It's only except for the buddhas.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，隨所至方舉下足處，即有千葉金蓮華生，其華微妙有大光明，
translation: When I had attained unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment, a thousand petals of golden lotus blossoms grew on my feet wherever I went. The flowers were exquisitely delicate and shining greatly.

source_sentence: 我當遣至無佛之處稱讚我名。
translation: I will send them to a place where there are no buddhas and praise my name.

source_sentence: 若有眾生於此華中得聞稱讚我名字者，尋生歡喜種諸善根欲生我國，願命終時，
translation: If there are any sentient beings who hear my name praised in this flower, they will be born with joy and plant roots of goodness. They will wish to be reborn in our country.

source_sentence: 悉皆來生。
translation: They all come to birth.

source_sentence: 我諸大眾出家之人，遠離諂曲、妬嫉、姦欺、沙門之垢，尊重於法，於諸所須名稱利養，
translation: “O Mahāsthāmaprāpta, we renunciants of the householder’s life should abstain from flattery, jealousy, hypocrisy, and deceitfulness. We should revere the Dharma and give it to those who need praise and benefit.

source_sentence: 心不貴重，常樂苦、空、無常、無我，常勤精進，尊法依僧。
translation: Their minds are not esteemed, and they always strive with diligence for permanence, bliss, suffering, emptiness, impermanence, and selflessness; the venerable Dharma depends on the Sangha.

source_sentence: 若諸菩薩得不退者，皆悉令得就雨三昧，以三昧力故，為眾生說般若波羅蜜，
translation: If enlightening beings attain nonbacksliding, they cause all to attain the concentration of going down in the rain; and by the power of that concentration they teach sentient beings the transcendent wisdom.

source_sentence: 令離生死乃至成佛，於其中間所可說法不忘不失。
translation: He causes them to be free of birth and death until they become buddhas, and whatever teachings he teaches there won't be forgotten or lost.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我成佛已，壽命住世十千大劫，般涅槃後，正法住世滿一千劫。』
translation: After I become a buddha, my life span in the world will be 10,000 great eons, and after parinirvāṇa, the right teaching will remain in the world for 1,000 eons.'

source_sentence: 「爾時，如來讚阿閦言：『善哉！
translation: At that point, the Tathāgata praised Akṣobhya, saying, 'Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Excellent, good!

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝今已取清淨世界，汝於來世過一恒河沙等阿僧祇劫，入第二恒河沙等阿僧祇劫，
translation: In the future you will pass one aeon equal incalculable kalpa away and enter the second eon equal incalculable kalpa.

source_sentence: 東方去此十佛世界，彼有世界名曰妙樂，所有莊嚴如汝所願，皆悉具足，
translation: In the east, beyond these ten buddha-worlds, there is a world called Marvelous Bliss, all adorned as you wish.

source_sentence: 汝於是中當成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，猶號阿閦如來、應、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊。』
translation: In this, you will attain supreme perfect enlightenment, which is still called the unsurpassed Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened, Perfect in Knowledge and Conduct, Well-gone, Understander of the World, Unsurpassed, Tamer of Humans, Teacher of Gods and People, Buddha, Bhagavān.'

source_sentence: 「爾時，阿閦菩薩白佛言：『世尊！
translation: At that point, the abhidharma bodhisattva said to the Buddha, 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若我所願成就得己利者，一切世間陰、界、諸入所攝眾生皆得慈心，無怨賊想及諸穢濁，
translation: If someone accomplishes what I wish to attain for their own benefit, all the worldly aggregates, realms, and sentient beings who are included in the sense-fields will attain kindness, without enemies, thieves, thoughts, or defilements.

source_sentence: 身心快樂猶如十住諸菩薩等，處蓮華上結加趺坐，三昧正受；
translation: The bliss of body and mind is like the enlightening beings in the ten stages who are seated cross-legged on a lotus flower, absorbed in concentration.

source_sentence: 以三昧力，令心無垢，是諸眾生身心快樂，亦復如是。
translation: By the power of samādhi, they cause their minds to be unsullied, and so are sentient beings who are happy in body and mind, just as they are.

source_sentence: 我今頭面敬禮於佛，唯願此地有金色光。』
translation: Now, I bow my head and face in respect to the Buddha, wishing only that this place will have a golden light.'

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 爾時，阿閦菩薩以頭面敬禮佛足，是時一切無量眾生，身心即得受大快樂，
translation: At that moment, the bodhisattva Anuruddha venerated the Buddha by bowing his forehead at his feet. Thereupon, innumerable sentient beings attained great bliss both in body and mind.

source_sentence: 其地亦有金色光明。
translation: The ground also has a golden light.

source_sentence: 「『尊意且起，　　汝今以令，
translation: 'Honored one, please give rise to it. Now that you've done so,

source_sentence: 一切眾心，　　心無忿怒，
translation: All the minds of sentient beings have no anger in their minds.

source_sentence: 復於眾生，　　生大悲心，
translation: Again, great compassion arises for sentient beings.

source_sentence: 兩手各得，　　天千輻輪，
translation: Each hand has a thousand-spoked wheel of the gods.

source_sentence: 淨意當來，　　為天人尊。』
translation: The pure mind will come in the future, and he'll be honored by gods and humans.'

source_sentence: 「爾時，寶藏如來為阿閦菩薩而說偈言：「善男子！
translation: At the time, the Ratnaketu Tathāgata spoke a verse for Akṣobhya Bodhisattva, saying, Good man!

source_sentence: 爾時，阿閦菩薩聞是偈已，心大歡喜，即起合掌，前禮佛足，去佛不遠，
translation: At that moment, having heard these verses, the bodhisattva Anuruddha was greatly delighted. Hearing them, he stood up and joined his palms at the Buddha’s feet, venerated him by bowing his forehead to his feet, and went not far from him.

source_sentence: 復坐聽法。」
translation: Again, he'll sit and listen to the teaching.

source_sentence: 悲華經卷第四
translation: Compassionate Flower Scripture, Volume 4
